title: Tbao Hub Blade Ball Script 2024 - Auto parry (Mobile)
text:
From this page you can download a new script Tbao Hub for mobile version of the game Blade Ball (Roblox) with functions Auto parry, Speed, Infinite jump and the ability to activate the script without using a key. Very simple, but convenient and necessary for every player in the mobile version of BB.
Use this script using the GUI, select the desired function and enjoy the hidden features of the game, which will simplify your gameplay and make it much more interesting and faster.
Tbao Hub script works perfectly in the new year 2024, WITHOUT A KEY.

How to use Roblox Scripts?
creator: thaibao7444
